document.full_text: taliban insurgents seized a district in afghanistan's remote northeast after a brief battle with police, provincial officials said on tuesday, underscoring the difficulty afghan and foreign forces face in securing the increasingly violent region.
document.title: taliban fighters seize district in afghanistan's remote east
lines_and_colors: taliban insurgents seized a district in afghanistan's remote northeast after a brief battle with police, provincial officials said on tuesday, underscoring the difficulty afghan and foreign forces face in securing the increasingly violent region.
